result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicole M Favro was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • False Swearing, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Probation is to run concurrent with any other probation case.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is to abide by all rules and recommendations of the supervising agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicole M Favro

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Courtesy warrant letter sent to the defendant at 503 Fairview Ct  Wautoma, WI  54982  has been returned.  Return to sender.  Not Deliverable as addressed.  Unable to Forward.

2:07 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  DA recites offer, upon plea with request probation.  Defendant will accept offer.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  30 days county jail, stayed and places the defendant on probation for 1 year.

CONDITIONS:

court costs
Defendant is to abide by all rules and recommendations of the supervising agent

Probation to run concurrent with any other probation case.

Defendant is to complete processing.

Court adjourned at 2:17 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Nicole M Favro
Current: 328 S. Brooklyn St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 05-14-2015)
Prior: 503 Fairview Ct, Wautoma, WI 54982

Call from defendant regarding her missed court appearance on May 11th.  States her current address is 328 S. Brooklyn, Berlin.  Advised defendant to appear on Monday, May 18th at 1:30 p.m.  Warrant will be issued if she does not appear.

Warrant letter sent to the defendant, respond on or before May 22, 2015 or warrant will be issued.

NOTE:  Also sent to:  501 Dartford Rd  Berlin, WI  54923

1:53 p.m.  No appearance by the Defendant.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders a warrant, stayed for two weeks.

Court adjourned at 1:53 p.m.
